name: Hitachi Energy RTU500 series CMU Firmware存在未明漏洞
product: ["Hitachi Energy RTU500 series CMU Firmware >=13.4.1\uff0c<13.4.4", "Hitachi Energy RTU500 series CMU Firmware >=12.2.1\uff0c<=12.2.11", "Hitachi Energy RTU500 series CMU Firmware >=12.4.1\uff0c<=12.4.11", "Hitachi Energy RTU500 series CMU Firmware >=12.6.1\uff0c<=12.6.9", "Hitachi Energy RTU500 series CMU Firmware >=12.7.1\uff0c<=12.7.6", "Hitachi Energy RTU500 series CMU Firmware >=13.2.1\uff0c<=13.2.6", "Hitachi Energy RTU500 series CMU Firmware >=13.5.1\uff0c<=13.5.3"]
description: RTU500是日本日立制作所（Hitachi）公司的一系列工控组件，主要用于工业控制系统。Hitachi Energy RTU500 series CMU Firmware存在安全漏洞，该漏洞源于stb语言文件处理中存在问题，攻击者可利用漏洞在授权用户上传特制的stb语言文件时，强制将诊断文本显示为空字符串。
solution:
厂商已发布补丁修复漏洞，请广大用户及时下载更新：
https://publisher.hitachienergy.com/preview?DocumentId=8DBD000190&languageCode=en&Preview=true
patch: Hitachi Energy RTU500 series CMU Firmware存在未明漏洞的补丁
